v1.0.x

StackFrame v1.0 is out! Major features:

  • eval, native, and global code can now be represented.
  • evalOrigin represents location of code within an evalâ€™d String or Function
  • BREAKING CHANGE: new StackFrame(obj) is now constructed with an Object parameter. For example:

js var stackFrame = new StackFrame({ functionName: 'funName', args: ['args'], fileName: 'http://localhost:3000/file.js', lineNumber: 1, columnNumber: 3288, isEval: true, isNative: false, source: 'ORIGINAL_STACK_LINE' });

v0.3.x

  • Add source (original stack line) to StackFrame definition

  • Add name to AMD definition
  • Better docs

v0.2.0
